title: Login not working
description: Customer unable to log into the web portal using their credentials.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Checkout process fails when processing payments via credit card.

title: Slow page loading
description: Website performance is slow on product listing pages.

title: Error 404 on dashboard
description: User dashboard page returns a 404 error after login.

title: Refund request not processed
description: Customer refund request stuck in pending state for 5 days.

title: Search bar not returning results
description: Search functionality broken for product queries.

title: Account locked after multiple login attempts
description: User account gets permanently locked without recovery option.

title: Broken image links
description: Product images not loading on category pages.

title: Duplicate orders placed
description: System creates two identical orders after one checkout attempt.
